doxygen.brief: pass a single char argument as a scalar.

functions._decl: void passCharPtr(char * dest+intent(out)+len(Ndest), const char * src+intent(in))

doxygen.description:
dest is marked intent(OUT) to override the intent(INOUT) default
This avoid a copy-in on dest.

fmt.C_prototype: char * dest, int Ndest, const char * src

functions._decl: void passCharPtr(char * dest+intent(out)+len(Ndest), const char * src+intent(in)+len_trim(Lsrc))

doxygen.description:
dest is marked intent(OUT) to override the intent(INOUT) default
This avoid a copy-in on dest.

fmt.C_prototype: char * dest, int Ndest, const char * src, int Lsrc

doxygen.description:
Save contents of arg1.
arg1 is assumed to be intent(IN) since it is const
Will copy in.

Save contents of arg1.
arg1 is assumed to be intent(IN) since it is const
Will copy in.

Append "dog" to the end of arg1.
arg1 is assumed to be intent(INOUT)
Must copy in and copy out.

Append "dog" to the end of arg1.
arg1 is assumed to be intent(INOUT)
Must copy in and copy out.

fmt.C_prototype: char * arg1, int Larg1, int Narg1

post_call: // {c_var_len} is always 1, test to silence warning about unused variable
